attributes.action: consider the law regarding employees holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wish to petition about statutory holidays.  New employees generally receive twenty days in the first year of employment, but thereafter can it please be increased, i.e. 1 extra day per year for a year's loyal service, etc; up to a maximum of 5 extra days over a five year period.
lst year - 20 days. 2nd year - 21 days. 3rd year - 22 days. 4th year - 23 days. 5 years and over - 25 days. Then for 10 years service you should receive an extra 5 days leave, i.e. making it 6 weeks holiday.
